title: videos wont stream/play
content: Videos will not play in firefox. They will play in safari. I tried clearing cache and settings to allow websites to auto play video and sound. Nothing is working. It says I have the latest version of firefox. HELP!
creator: sherryecushman

title: Syncing Issues
content: Hello Mozilla. I am logged on to my Firefox account on a new computer. Although I have logged in, I haven't experienced Firefox automatically syncing my bookmarks and extensions as I did two computers ago to this last computer. I have tried syncing numerous time (pressing the sync button in my account) to no avail. What do I need to do to get this working? Thank you for your time and attention.
creator: sleepyalligator227

title: Google Search Results Screen Loads Incorrectly
content:
Hello,

I recently switched from Brave to FireFox, and notice that my Google search results page doesn't load properly. I'm not sure how long after switching this was an issue. I feel like Google worked fine for a time, but now it's suddenly loading improperly.

I've also grabbed the console output from Google when on a search results page. You can find that here.

I'm using Windows 11 and have never had this issue happen before as far as I can remember. I am aware of a thread with an identical issue, but my issue still persists even after trying their solution.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks!
creator: Noisyroblot101

title: how do you turn off 11 digit phone numbers, the STANDARD IN THE USA IS 10
content: how do you turn off 11 digit phone numbers in firefox, most web sites i want/need 10 digit phone numbers not 11 how can i turn off your addition of the 11th number
